Package org.araneaframework.backend.list.helper.naming

Interface Summary
NamingStrategy Naming conventions between list fields and database columns.
 

Class Summary
ColumnAliasVariableResolver VariableResolver that converts a variable (using its name) into column alias.
ColumnNameVariableResolver VariableResolver that converts a variable (using its name) into column name.
MappingNamingStrategyAndFields Naming conventions and list of fields provider which is based on mappings.
NopNamingStrategy NamingStrategy implementation which does not alter the names.
OrNamingStrategy Composite NamingStrategy that returns the result of the first child that gives a not-null value.
PrefixMapNamingStrategy Improved naming conventions between list fields and database columns which enables to defined custom prefixes for database column names.
StandardNamingStrategy Standard naming conventions between list fields and database columns.
